TopicTitle: Watch the You Choose Gaming Channel Trailer (YCG)! Get a SAY in what I MAKE AT YCG!

Articles.Content:
Hello there, this is YCG gamer (You Choose Gaming gamer). I am advertising a channel, but not any ordinary channel.

My YouTube channel is a one where you can vote what I make for most of my future videos!

My Youtube channel is where all (or at the very least, most) of your comments are read and (if you asked something) are answered!

Take a look at my channel trailer if you want to:

Link:

I used to have a poll open to vote on what I should make for this weekend (I posted the channel trailer you saw here a week ago) but I closed it now because I'm making a second video. Only one person voted, and that was to make KSP comedy videos, so I'll make some comedy videos on KSP and some other stuff too .

After you take a look at the video, I hope you enjoyed it and will like the future ones i'll make!

If the video interests you, subscribe to it and/or like it to show you are interested .

Remember, you will get a say in what I make for this channel, so if you have been waiting for a youtuber to make a submit-your-crafts Mun base series, then that's what you'll get (if the majority votes that too) .

Thanks

YCG gamer
